abstract.t: This Internet-Draft is written in response to the SPIRITS WG chairs'call for contributions to the future RFC on the SPIRITS protocolrequirements. As such, it documents to consensus of the SPIRITS WG onthe choice of SPIRITS transport protocol and lists general requirementsas well as those pertinent to Intelligent Network (IN), Wireless IN, andthe PSTN/Internet iNTernetworking (PINT) building blocks.
